history.proof: srun best use: removeAfterIndex_in, removeAfterIndex_In_le, removeAfterIndex_le_In unfold: logIndex.

original: intros xs ys i x Hsorted_xs Hsorted_ys Hin_remove H_in; unfold removeAfterIndex in *; remember (eIndex x <=? i) as b eqn:Hle; destruct b; [ apply removeAfterIndex_le_In in Hle as Hin_all; apply Hin_all in H_in; assumption | apply removeAfterIndex_In_le in Hin_remove; lia ].
